an4.50:1.1: “Cattarome, bhikkhave, candimasuriyanam upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittha candimasuriya na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:1.3: Abbha, bhikkhave, candimasuriyanam upakkilesa, yena upakkilesena upakkilittha candimasuriya na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:2.1: Mahika, bhikkhave, candimasuriyanam upakkilesa, yena upakkilesena upakkilittha candimasuriya na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:3.1: Dhumo rajo, bhikkhave, candimasuriyanam upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittha candimasuriya na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:4.1: Rahu, bhikkhave, asurindo candimasuriyanam upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittha candimasuriya na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:4.2: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro candimasuriyanam upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittha candimasuriya na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:5.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattarome samanabrahmananam upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittha eke samanabrahmana na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:5.3: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana suram pivanti merayam, suramerayapana appativirata.
an4.50:5.4: Ayam, bhikkhave, pathamo samanabrahmananam upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittha eke samanabrahmana na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:6.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana methunam dhammam patisevanti, methunasma dhamma appativirata.
an4.50:6.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo samanabrahmananam upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittha eke samanabrahmana na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:7.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana jataruparajatam sadiyanti, jataruparajatapatiggahana appativirata.
an4.50:7.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, tatiyo samanabrahmananam upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittha eke samanabrahmana na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:8.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana micchajivena jivanti, micchajiva appativirata.
an4.50:8.2: Ayam, bhikkhave, catuttho samanabrahmananam upakkileso, yena upakkilesena upakkilittha eke samanabrahmana na tapanti na bhasanti na virocanti.
an4.50:8.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro samanabrahmananam upakkilesa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkilittha eke samanabrahmana na tapanti na bhasanti na virocantiti.
